title: Council Regulation (EC) No 1291/94 of 30 May 1994 suspending the generalized tariff preferences for certain products originating in the Republic of Korea
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 1291/94 of 30 May 1994 suspending the generalized tariff preferences for certain products originating in the Republic of Korea
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The preferences envisaged by Regulation (EC) No 3668/93 shall be suspended for those products originating in the Republic of Korea which are listed in Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 3832/90 (2).

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 May 1994.
For the Council
The President
G. MORAITIS
(1) OJ No L 338, 31. 12. 1993, p. 22.
(2) OJ No L 370, 31. 12. 1990, p. 39. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 3668/93 (OJ No L 338, 31. 12. 1993, p. 1).
